definition: to plan to/to draft (a plan)/to imitate/to assess/to compare/pseudo-
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
imitation/to simulate/to imitate/analog (device, as opposed to digital)
to compare/to draw a parallel/to match/analogy/metaphor/comparison
first draft/to draw up (a first version)
to fit (data to a model)/a (close) fit
to write in the style of some author/to write as if from the mouth of sb/a pastiche

sentences.english: The center conditions and isochronous center conditions for a class of quasi - analytic systems were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了一類擬解析系統的中心條件與等時中心條件。

sentences.english: We update sensitivities matrix by the quasi-Newton method after the first inversion.
sentences.chinese: 在第一次反演之後，採用擬牛頓法更新靈敏度矩陣。

sentences.english: The central government will allocate 43.3 billion yuan to stimulate employment;
sentences.chinese: 中央財政擬投入433億元用於促進就業。

sentences.english: One aspect of the invention is concerned with cannabimimetic pyrazole analogs.
sentences.chinese: 本發明一方面涉及擬大麻吡唑類似物。

sentences.english: Echeveria agavoides grows in a certain area of Mexico.
sentences.chinese: 景天科擬石蓮花屬植物冬雲生長在墨西哥特定的區域。

sentences.english: In your case, we are prepared to be lenient .
sentences.chinese: 根據你的情況，我們擬予以從寬處理。

sentences.english: The stability of the solutions set for symmetric strong vector quasi-equilibrium problems are studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究對稱強向量擬均衡問題解集的穩定性。

sentences.english: This paper studies the initial boundary value problem for a class of quasilinear pesudoparabolic integrodifferential equations.
sentences.chinese: 研究一類擬線性擬拋物型積分微分方程的初邊值問題。

sentences.english: This paper studies the initial boundary value problem for a class of quasilinear pesudoparabolic integrodifferential equations.
sentences.chinese: 研究一類擬線性擬拋物型積分微分方程的初邊值問題。

sentences.english: It plans to develop the handicraft industry in the area alongside Guoji Road.
sentences.chinese: 在國基路兩側地區，擬大力發展工藝品製作業。

sentences.english: The forth chapter discusses the development and transformation of the imitating ancient poetry in Wei, Jin and Northern & Southern dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 第四章論述魏晉南北朝擬“古詩”的發展流變。

sentences.english: Certain drugs and chemicals also have been shown to decrease the activity of pseudocholine esterase.
sentences.chinese: 有些藥物和化學制品也表明能降低擬膽鹼酯酶的活性。

sentences.english: When engineers copy the shapes found in nature we call it Biomimetics.
sentences.chinese: 當工程師複製自然界中的結構我們就稱之爲擬生物學。

sentences.english: This study was to explore MRI performances and features of schwannomas from cranial nerves in posterior cranial fossae.
sentences.chinese: 本研究擬探討後顱窩顱神經鞘瘤的MRI表現及特徵。

sentences.english: EU proposes 'black boxes' for buses and taxis.
sentences.chinese: 歐盟擬爲公交車輛裝“黑匣子”。

sentences.english: Diagnostic criteria and principles of management of occupational acute pyrethroids poisoning.
sentences.chinese: 職業性急性擬除蟲菊酯中毒診斷標準及處理原則。

definition: according to this/on the ground of the above/(formally introduces reported speech in writing)
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])
to purchase (from various places)/to acquire (a company)
plan/project/program/to plan/to map out/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]
chip (in gambling)/token (for counting)/ticket/to prepare/to plan/to raise (funds)/resource/means
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]
to exploit (a resource)/to open up (for development)/to develop
to set up/to arrange/to establish/to found/to display
and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
